articles.description: Gavaskar termed both Rahul and Pant as street-smart cricketer and picked them as India's future vice-captains after Rohit Sharma takes over as T20I captain at the completion of T20 World Cup.  | Cricket
articles.content: Sunil Gavaskar identified KL Rahul and Rishabh Pant as the possible vice-captains for the Indian T20I side after Rohit Sharma takes over from Virat Kohli at the completion of the ICC T20 World Cup in… [+2376 chars]

articles.title: England cricketers would tour Pakistan, believes Mushtaq - DAWN.com
articles.description: Says Pakistan deserves better after the team toured England last year.
articles.content: LAHORE: Former spinner Mushtaq Ahmed believes that Englands cricketers would happily tour Pakistan and says his country deserved better having travelled the other way at the height of the pandemic. … [+2982 chars]
